name: there is a hole in your wall
name_original: there is a hole in your wall
description:
Embark on a strange journey under a red moon, across fields of cannibal flowers.

Try to survive hellish inhabitants through your wits and dragon.

Choose your actions wisely for they will decide how your tale ends.

Uncover the mysteries of the anomaly in your wall.

CURRENT VERSION (DEMO) FEATURING

  • 3 different locales and some secret locations
  • 3 different dragons:
    • red
    • green
    • white
  • meaningful choices that will even affect which dragon you get
  • 1 RPG battle
  • pixel-art
  • easter egg items that might be useful in the full version
  • many ways to die, so make sure to save from time to time!

Note: If you haven't seen the dragon yet, it's because it appears toward the end of the demo. Though your actions will count toward which dragon you get. So make your choices wisely!

Thank you for playing! Feel free to leave your thoughts in the comment section.

Would you prefer that the game is updated as it is created?

For hints and updates, you can find me on:

Twitter: buttoncupcake1

Instagram: buttoncupcake

and itch.io of course!
